content.text: I'm planning a trip to Europe. I'm going to visit my friend Abigail in London, and then I'm going to tour around Italy.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to go to Europe.
You should! It's a beautiful place.
I know, I know. I've seen pictures.
Have you been to any other countries?
No, I haven't. I've always wanted to go to Japan, but I don't think I'll be able to afford it anytime soon.
Maybe you could save up for a trip. It would be worth it.
Yeah, maybe. I'll have to think about it.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to ride my motorcycle, and I love art.
That's cool. I've never been on a motorcycle, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You won't regret it.
So, what kind of art do you like?
I like all kinds of art, but I'm especially drawn to abstract and surrealistic paintings.
Those are my favorites too!
Really? That's so cool! I've never met anyone else who likes abstract art.
I know, right? It's so weird.
I love how it can be interpreted in so many different ways.
Me too! It's so much more interesting than just looking at a picture of a tree or something.
Exactly!
I'm glad I met you. You're so cool!
Thanks! You're cool too!
